document.full_text: rap icon snoop dogg and upstart wiz khalifa are teaming up for a new film, "high school," which the former calls "a comedy stoner movie, a little something for the stoners."
document.title: snoop dogg, wiz khalifa team up for "stoner movie"
lines_and_colors: rap icon snoop dogg and upstart wiz khalifa are teaming up for a new film, "high school," which the former calls "a comedy stoner movie, a little something for the stoners."
